Others: The article provides the schedule, venues, timings, and live streaming details for the Super Eight phase of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024, including India's matches against Afghanistan, Bangladesh/Netherlands, and Australia.
T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8 Groups: Group 2: South Africa, West Indies, United States of America, England
T20 World Cup 2024 India's Super 8 Date,: June 20: India vs Afghanistan, Kensington Oval, Barbados [8:00 PM IST]
June 22: India vs Bangladesh/Netherlands, Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, Antigua [8:00 PM IST]
June 24: India vs Australia, Daren Sammy Cricket Ground, St Lucia [8:00 PM IST]
T20 World Cup 2024 Live Streaming: Indian cricket fans can catch all the action live on the Star Sports Network, while the live streaming will be available on Disney+ Hotstar, ensuring they don't miss a single moment of the excitement.
